alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:46PM EDT until July 30 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR DEKALB AND SOUTHEASTERN FULTON COUNTIES... At 1146 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Decatur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Atlanta, Tucker, Belmont, Sweet Auburn, Arabia Mountain, and Piedmont Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
